alert.note: Alert for Fresno (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 21 at 2:56PM PDT until August 21 at 3:45PM PDT by NWS Hanford
info.description: The National Weather Service in Hanford CA has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... West central Fresno County in central California... * Until 345 PM PDT. * At 256 PM PDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 12 miles southwest of Mendota, or 34 miles southwest of Madera, moving north at 10 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Panoche Road. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. This thunderstorm is capable of producing all types of severe weather including extremely large hail, destructive straight line winds and tornadoes. Move quickly to a safe shelter such as an interior room, a bathroom, closet or basement.
